issue.title: [False Positive] Request removal of sxtracking.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Hi maintainers,

I am the owner/developer of sxtracking.com.

I noticed that our domain has been listed in your blocklist. I would like to clarify that this is a False Positive.

Reason for delisting:

Business Nature: SUXIN (sxtracking.com) is a B2B Supply Chain Management System for compliance and logistics traceability (e.g., EU-TPD, EUDR compliance).

Not Ad-Tracking: We do NOT serve advertisements or track user privacy behavior for marketing purposes. The word "tracking" in our domain refers to "Cargo/Product Traceability" (physical goods movement), not digital ad tracking.

Impact: This block is preventing our legitimate manufacturing clients from accessing their compliance dashboards.

Please verify and whitelist our domain. Thank you for your hard work in the community!

Best regards, 
jacky 

### Proposed solution

Hi maintainers,

I am the owner/developer of sxtracking.com.

I noticed that our domain has been listed in your blocklist. I would like to clarify that this is a False Positive.

Reason for delisting:

Business Nature: SUXIN (sxtracking.com) is a B2B Supply Chain Management System for compliance and logistics traceability (e.g., EU-TPD, EUDR compliance).

Not Ad-Tracking: We do NOT serve advertisements or track user privacy behavior for marketing purposes. The word "tracking" in our domain refers to "Cargo/Product Traceability" (physical goods movement), not digital ad tracking.

Impact: This block is preventing our legitimate manufacturing clients from accessing their compliance dashboards.

Please verify and whitelist our domain. Thank you for your hard work in the community!

Best regards, 
jacky 

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.16.6.1 for Pale Moon

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.titulky.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

If I enable AdGuard - Ads filter in uBlock Origin for Pale Moon then the top menu on website https://www.titulky.com is broken.
The url for the AdGuard - Ads filter is there this: https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt
And says on top:
! Title: AdGuard Base filter
! Description: This filter is necessary for quality ad blocking.
! Version: 2.4.43.95
! TimeUpdated: 2026-02-01T06:22:15+00:00
! Expires: 5 days (update frequency)
! Homepage: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardFilters

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/152c489a-0f1b-4b10-b5e3-bdcd30da2f54)

With the mentioned filter enabled it is broken:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c3432ed1-81f0-4d32-96d8-2980e3502cb2)

Browser version Pale Moon 34.0.1 x64


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
